capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. He seems really confident in his own age, and I can tell you're feeling pretty sure about it too, right?
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of hobbies does valeria have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm so glad to see Professor McGonagall around here. She's an amazing educator and a true leader at Hogwarts. I've always admired her dedication to the school and its students.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of hogwarts before, can you tell me more about this magical school?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm glad to see that Hagrid is still affiliated with Hogwarts. It's a great comfort to know that he's still around, looking out for the students and staff. I've always had a lot of respect for him, you know? He's just so kind and caring, even if he can be a bit intimidating at times.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of you before, valeria, but i'm so excited to learn more about hagrid   who is he?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is still going strong. Apparently, Hagrid's age is an adult, which is pretty impressive considering all the responsibilities he has as the gamekeeper here at Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i didn't know that you're an adult, valeria! that's really interesting.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia is an adult. I'm quite sure about that, and I feel confident in my statement.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of petunia before, tell me more about it!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's lineage is quite fascinating. I mean, have you seen the different varieties of petunias out there? They come in such a wide range of colors and patterns, it's amazing. And when it comes to maculogy, or the spots on their leaves, some people think they're just a result of genetic variation, while others believe they might be a defense mechanism against pests. I'm pretty sure that petunias with maculogy are actually more resistant to certain diseases, which is why they're so popular among gardeners.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of character is maculogy?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is affiliated with Grandine Company. I'm pretty sure about that.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, Vernon is affiliated with Grandine Company. I'm not entirely sure about the details of their relationship, but it seems like they're connected in some way. (Certainty: 60%, Polarity: Neutral, Sentiment: Neutral, Emotion: Curious)
So, Vernon is affiliated with Grandine-Company. I've worked with them before and they seem like a reputable organization. (Sentiment: Positive)
